name: mist
effect: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
short_effect: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
